text: The 2011 All Thailand Golf Tour is the 13th season of the All Thailand Golf Tour, the main professional golf tour in Thailand since it was established in 1999. ==Tournament results== The table below shows the 2011 schedule. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" !Date !! Tournament !! Location !! Prize money men (฿) !! Prize money women (฿) !! Men's winner !! Women's winner |- | 6 Feb || Singha Masters || Santiburi Country Club Chiang Rai || align=right|3,000,000 || align=right|200,000 || Kang Min-Woong || Pornanong Phatlum |- | 8 May || Singha Pattaya Open || Burapha Golf Club (D-B) || align=right|1,500,000 || align=right|100,000 || Prom Meesawat || Thidapa Suwannapura |- | 2 Jul || Singha E-San Open || Singha Park Khon Kaen Golf Club || align=right|1,500,000 || align=right|100,000 || Udorn Duangdecha || Patcharajutar Kongpraphan |- | 4 Sep || B-Ing TPC Championships || Naraihill Golf Resort & Country Club || align=right|1,500,000 || align=right|100,000 || Pijit Petchkasem || Aunchisa Utama (a) |- | 25 Dec || Singha Classic || Rancho Charnvee Country Club || align=right|1,500,000 || align=right|100,000 || Michael Tran || Pornanong Phatlum |- | 11 Mar 2012 || Singha Masters || Santiburi Country Club Chiang Rai || align=right|3,000,000 || align=right|200,000 || Prayad Marksaeng || Thidapa Suwannapura |} ==References== Category:All Thailand Golf Tour All Thailand Golf Tour
title: 2011 All Thailand Golf Tour
